mapper.select: SELECT insp.rsc_insp_code, insp.rsc_insp_date, insp.rsc_cd_code, rsccode.rsc_cd_name, insp.rsc_insp_vol, insp.rsc_infer_vol, rsccode.rsc_cd_unit, insp.rsc_insp_st, emp.emp_name, insp.rsc_insp_remk FROM BF_RSC_INSP insp LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_RSC_CODE rsccode ON insp.rsc_cd_code = rsccode.rsc_cd_code LEFT JOIN BF_CMN_EMP emp ON insp.emp_id = emp.emp_id ORDER BY 1 DESC
